patthana15.85:4.1: Araṇaṃ maggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo namaggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.85:5.1: Araṇaṃ maggahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo namaggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.85:6.1: Araṇaṃ maggādhipatiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo namaggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
